name: Eric Wadman
text:
Fantastic radio. Years ago I was a Futaba flyer but when 2.4 came I went to spectrum. So fast forward 9 years. I decided to look at the new Futaba 16IZ. Love it.

Thanks Futaba am back.

name: Bo Han
text: You guys are awesome!  All of my modification requests for a new order 18SZ radio have been completed in a timely manner.  I appreciate the technician keeping me up to date during and after the service.  My order was shipped promptly and was packaged well.  Thanks again!

name: Chad Wrightson
text: Fast shipping. 760r gyro is the best! Bar none

name: Steven Bowen
text: Customer service does not respond to emails (it's been well over a week). Items missing from shipment (battery tray from 7pxr, so I ordered a rechargable battery. Battery I ordered is labelled differently despite same part number. No one can answer if the battery is still a LiFe or if it's now a LiPo battery and the label declares it to be both. I cannot charge this battery without knowing the chemistry or it WILL be ruined lipo vs life = different max cell voltages.  Spent well over a $1000 in the last couple weeks with this company between the radio, servo, battery etc. Thinking about sending all of it back.

name: Jeffrey Joos
text: parts in stock and shipped out asap!!  I would buy directly from futaba again for sure

name: Steven Rhodes
text: I send my 18MZ in for minor repairs.  A busted antenna and malfunctioning alarm vibration mode.  Everything is working fine now.  The turn around time was a little longer than usual.  Hopefully they'll get that taken care of in time but I have no complaints about their product or service otherwise.

name: William Centineo
text: The order you did a great job. I purchased the 7pxr for it's ability to slow throttle speeds down and be able to make my own throttle curve but though many different test my data is showing that I am not getting the out put of my personal curve I put in . Is there a specific way that I need to do to have my curve actually work or is this just a gemic to keep up with others .

name: Alexander McInnis
text: Battery arrived. Thank you very much, great job. Wish you had dealers here in Canada

name: Michael Hollowell
text:
I have been using Futaba products for well over 20 years…  since the USA branch of Futaba started… they are good at taking your money for product and shipping promptly but horrible when it comes to support.

Many times I have emailed support with zero response.

As long as you don’t need support Futaba USA is a good company for you product needs.

name: Drew Church
text: Futaba has been my go to setup for decades. Quality products with outstanding reliability. The Futaba T10J runs my aircraft fleet and a 4PV and 4PM  handle the surface big bore fleet.

name: Edward McCormick
text:
Dealing with Futaba was a great experience. My thanks to Mary Joe for all her help with some of the problems I created. The service department helped me with my problem and had the part in the mail that day.
Ed

name: J. K.
text: Awesome shopping experience.   Fast, great communication and super happy with the product.

name: Rich Steiner
text: I love your Samba. It is such a great flyer. Would like to see more videos out there about this plane, builds, maidens setups etc.Biplanes are my favorite,  I am saving up for your skyleaf BP.

name: CLEVELAND COLEMAN
text: Thanks for such great service and product along with fast shipping. I would recommend Futaba to all my friends and family. Dependability, Quality, and amazing Support.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback, Cleveland!

name: Stan Gustafson
text: Great service. Quality parts. Speedy shipping. No complaints. I always use Futaba.

name: Guenter Mueller
text: Great service . Altimeter functions exactly as expected. As usual Futaba quality is perfect. That’s why I’m using Futaba Tx and Rx for 40 plus years.

name: B T
text: Got my servos and fast delivery. Thank you!

name: Mark Hambrick
text: Very good experience with my purchase from Futaba.  Ordered the T16IZ on June 4th, arrived in good condition on the 9th.  Looking forward to learning this system as it's my first Futaba transmitter/receiver in twenty five years. I had questions about the transmitter & reached out to customers support as well as technical support. Both departments responded quickly & with detailed answers.  I'm a happy customer and look forward to getting back into the hobby.

name: Scott Schutz
text:
Email notification of out of stock items worked great. I was able to order my radio when I received the email.
Quick ship, packing excellent!!
Will buy from again.

name: Rick Current
text:
I got the new 16IZ transmitter. It was packed well and I received in a few days.
I really like the large screen and the feel of the transmitter.
Can't go wrong with Futaba. I've been using their radios for over 20 years .

name: Tony Quichocho
text: I have chosen Futaba products over the others in the market place. Simply for their quality and dependability. Others may argue price... but as the saying goes “ You get what you Paid for”  and when you purchase Futaba you get the best!

name: Bachir Battache
text: Hi, i recived my gos and i am super exited to see what is the potential of this updated version, thank you guys, amazing service you have 👍

name: Barry Blaisdell
text: You were slow to respond, had no ability to check individual parts to see if they were any good. Sent me all new parts that have the wrong frequency.  After 2 emails to your tech services I have yet to receive a response.

name: Thomas Avey
text:
Love My Futaba transmitter...

You should buy a Futaba Transmitter and build your model around it!!!

name: Basil Yousif
text: Got the new 16IZ and it's a great radio. Got it fast with free shipping from Futaba USA

name: Wayne Freeman
text: Futaba's been a staple in the RC hobby since I was a kid in the 80's who couldn't afford their wares.  As soon as I could manage to buy my first Futaba radio system, I haven't looked back - and all of my surface systems since have come from the company.  My latest purchase - a 7PXR - has every bit of the solidity and performance I've come to appreciate, which is a distinct advantage in an era of low grade plastics and junk electronics we call the 21st century.  On the fulfillment side, my order shipped quickly and arrived in a timely manner in working condition.    What more could I ask for?

name: Lynnette Babilonia-Lohr
text: Fast shipping item is perfect Im a happy Brapper!

name: David Ohanian
text: ordered new wall charger since original was damaged. Very happy.

name: Felipe Flumignan
text: The purchase was great as well as the shipment and the customer service. They were attentive and the service was fast. I highly recommend the store.

name: Niles Keeran
text: Wow. Futaba in the Deep South is lightning 4quick in processing and shipping orders. Far more efficient than B & H Photo in NYC who had three Hitek servos advertised but didn’t have them in stock or tell me they were on back order. I won a Futaba CAP9 Super at a swap meet and just trying to bring the unit back to life with the new Futaba 800 battery ,  FM RF module , R149DP,  Futaba S3151 servos, buying a FBC-30B(4) wall charger, and  CAMPac.

name: mike caccamise
text: I always have an excellent experience ordering Futaba products.  Quick delivery to boot.

name: Dan Finucane
text:
I am very pleased with the service I get from Futaba USA.  There products that I have bought from them is excellent quality. The tech support is great too!!
This is one of the reason I switched to Futaba. They care about there customers When they ship stuff to you ,  you do not have to worry about if your product will make it safely to you. It is well packaged.
So keep up the great work and speedy service.

Thank you!

Dan Finucane

resp.text: Dan, thanks for the 5-star review!

name: Smokey Joe
text: Great service.  No issues whatsoever.

name: Glenn Mohr
text:
I realize it was my fault that I chose UPS as the shipper of my item from you but this is to inform you that you should always use USPS when shipping to Canada as the item which was 240 CAN cost me and extra 101 CAN in Taxes and brokerage charges. I received a parcel from AJ Aircraft a month ago with 1500 CAN worth of Futaba servos and paid no taxes or brokerage fees.
I love my Futaba 18SZ radio.

--
Glenn Mohr

name: Bill Daniel
text: Product shipped quick, fast and in a hurry!

name: Alexander Chu
text: Their speedy service was great.

name: Michael Spangler
text: Outstanding radio. Upgrade from 16SZ and the feels much better in my hands.

name: Omar Alarcon
text:
Timely order processing and  package arrived on time
Friendly and intuitive web site for shopping
Great overall
Omar

name: Lee Osenton
text: Purchase shipped fast, packed well and priced competitively. This will be my first choice for future radio and RC needs.

name: David Mosier
text: I have been using Futaba radio systems for 30 years and have never experienced a Futaba servo failure. Futaba USA provides fast service on orders, competitive prices and great products.

name: Ed Miedzybrocki
text:
Ordering and shipping from your site was good and relatively quick.  However I was disappointed that couldn't order these items through my local hobby shop.  They were unable to get any stock status or availability either directly from you or through a distributor for months.

EM

name: Jason Smith
text: Products in Stock and fast shipping!

name: Adam Hill
text: I have been using Futaba radios for almost 30 years.  I have had nothing but the best R/C experiences with these products and customer service.

name: Ola Nordell
text:
We  wanted to buy the new Futaba 16IZ Transmitter but it was backordered!
We got notified from Futaba that it was in stock and we placed the order immediately. Item was received in a few days and my son Leo evaluated it and likes it better than our 16SZ. Better display, better looks and some new features. USB Charging is great and the way to go. the micro SD Card is a little different from the SD card but we got one with an adapter so that we can transfer the model programs between the Futaba transmitters.
Great transmitter at a reasonable cost.

name: anthony jones
text:
Excellent product an service

Thks Futada

name: Fred Van Heste
text: I find that Futaba goes out of their way to assist their customers.  They are very professional, and more importantly, very friendly in helping in helping their customers resolve their issues.  This is why I have never switched to the "other" brands.  I have been using Futaba since 1983 and will continue to use them (even though they are not the least expensive).  Keep up the marvelous work!  Fred

resp.text: Fred, thank you for being a loyal customer!  We hope to continue serving you well in the years ahead!  Thanks for the great 5-star review! :)

name: Marco De Fazio
text: High quality products and very honest and fair transaction.

name: joe DeHerrera
text: Quick shipping exactly what I ordered very happy. Excellent service.

name: Dave Zotzman
text: Price was what I expected, time to ship the product was what I expected, but unfortunately, I have to knock down quite a bit for shipping cost to Canada.  A couple of packages of connectors could go in a flat envelope for a few bucks instead of $21.25 which was more than the value of the product being ordered.  Another US shop I regularly order from, if they had the item in stock, shipping would have been $4.38.    I'm currently waiting on a box from Austrailia, $26.95 through Fedex.  It's these high rates that keep me from ordering directly from you.

name: Robert Winings
text: Great product fast shipping

name: Matt Mitchell
text:
Love my new  transmitter!  Intuitive programming, solid build quality, smooth controls, great touch screen.  One thing I am not sure about is the battery and charging doors... We'll have to see how they hold up after use.  Otherwise, top of the line!

Matt

resp.text: Thanks for your 5-star review and for you business!  We are glad that you're pleased with the transmitter thus far and hope it continues to meet your expectations!

name: Steve Pennypacker
text: FutabaUSA support has always been great. I also like that for small items they’re willing to ship much more cheaply than most vendors. When you’re only buying a $3 item it’s nice to pay $0.50 for shipping instead of $7.00.

resp.text: Steve, thanks for the 5-star review!  We are glad that you're pleased with our support and shipping costs.  Thanks for your business!!

name: Donald Kolehmainen
text: Had item in stock and shipped out immediately. Great service. Thank you. Don.

name: bcgaub
text: The service I received on my recent orders was super great!  No surprise to me since over the years I have never been disappointed in dealing with the Futaba Corporation.  Bernie

resp.text: Bernie, thanks for the excellent review!  We really appreciate it.  We're glad you've been a Futaba customer over the years.  We look forward to serving you well in the years ahead.

name: W A
text: My Futaba equipment functions great, is very high quality, easy to use and extremely well documented.  Some things seem a bit over priced like the LiFe Tx battery for instance.  Why price 4x higher than alternatives?  Technical service response hasn’t been what I had hoped for as I’ve been waiting on something very simple for a week.  I also wish that I could have better integration with other equipment specifically Crossfire.  In 35 years I have never owned anything but Futaba, but the alternatives are looking more attractive than ever.

name: Bill Coltart
text: The correct part arrived promptly

name: a b
text: Item arrived very quickly and correct!

name: nipon tepatiganon
text: Fast shipping good services.

name: Kerry DelVecchio
text: While I've been a Futaba user for years, and feel good about the radio signal reliability, I feel that the web site and product support are lacking.  There's very little information about some of the products online, and when I emailed product support I never received a reply.

name: Eric Hughett
text: Lifelong Futaba customer, good quality and quick shipment.

name: Clark Pedersen
text: My servos shipped so fast, and arrived in perfect condition. Always nice to be able to order right from Futaba.

name: Charles Cogo
text: Great products, great prices, expedient service

name: Bear Good
text: took half a month after ordering to actually ship. but it arrived 2 days after it shipped. only missed 4 races. should of only missed 1.

name: Bruce C Cole
text:
I received super service - fast reply, etc. from your support team.  They advised me of the part I needed.  And although it was out of stock for a few weeks, once it was in stock, it was shipped quickly and safely arrived -- faster than the original estimated delivery date.  Great Service!
Thanks,
Bruce

resp.text: Bruce, thanks for your 5-star review!  We're sorry the part was initially out of stock.  We appreciate your business.  Hopefully next time we'll have stock of everything you want.

name: Stephen Egge
text: Fast service, good quality.

name: Armon Beckom
text: Superfast service  Very please will be placing more orders

name: Bill Frost
text: Just received my new T16SZ.  Delivered early and undamaged which is great.  Being using Futaba radios now for over 30 years and have no major issues ever.  Having built many aircraft I don’t cut corners with my radio gear and stick with Futaba for reliability and compatibility.  Happy to take advantage of the sale and upgrade from my 8FG to the T16SZ!

name: Sebastian Papandrea
text: I bought (Order #129952) a radio equipment 18SZ with receiver R7014SB last Dec 29th and it is apperently still in teh way & blocked in Miami by USPS but despise my claims nobody answer. I would appreciate if FUTABA can push USPS to take action and ship it asap

name: DaDa Underconstruction
text: Quality of the equipment and customer service second.to none.

name: Randy Bridge
text: Fantastic products and very quick service

name: Keith Davis
text: FutabaUSA has always been reliable on fast to respond, some of the best R/C radio equipment on the market.  I would give a five star but the Team side of FutabaUSA is lacking

name: mark hasson
text: I think it is great for Nick that he is such an accomplished helicopter pilot! But some of us little guys still need help. Perhaps you could put someone in helicopter support who has time for us, because I can't get any support. I have exhausted every contact means available to me for over 2 weeks now with no response.

resp.text: Mark, we're sorry that we have not been able to help you.  Several of us have tried reaching out to you on several occasions, but when we try to call, there's no answer and you don't have voicemail setup.  We'll try reaching out to you today again.

name: william gibson
text: Exactly what I needed and in no time at all the parts were here!

name: mike stroup
text: Great job! Made the adjustment and shipped my system as promised!!

name: nick monte
text: I have emailed you 3 or 4 times about my order and how it was returned to sender by the usps and still haven't received word if your gonna fulfill my order or not

name: Stephen Marinshaw
text: Great support team at Futaba.  Quick response with the right answer on how to repair my Transmitter.  They could have asked me to ship my transmitter to their repair shop but saved me the time and expense with their response.  Thank you, Futaba Support Team!

resp.text: Awesome!  We will get word to our tech guys that you were pleased with the help you got!  Thanks for your review and use of Futaba's products!

name: Rudedawg Moto & RC
text:
Excellent quality shirts. I purchased 4 of them!
Futaba faithful forever. I've been using Futaba transmitters from day one (over 30 years) and I had to get apparel to let everyone know that I use the best Radio equipment available.
Thanks Futaba!

resp.text: Thanks for your loyalty, business, and awesome review!  We appreciate it!

name: Ray Martin
text: Great job, I use these servos alot, fast shipping

name: Pinnacle Hobby
text: My shop has always been treated well by Futaba USA.  They represent a fantastic product.  You can't go wrong with Futaba.  Buy a Futaba from your local hobby shop.  You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Thanks for selling Futaba products.  We really appreciate you.  We hope to continue meeting and exceeding your expectations in the months and years ahead!

name: Richard Russ
text: I wish I could say something great about Futaba's service but I can't. I sent my transmitter to Futaba and a new receiver to have them checked out. So far it has been 45 days and still no word when I will get my parts checked out and returned.

resp.text: Hey, Richard.  We are very sorry about this.  Our crew is looking into this issue right now to determine where the ball got dropped.  You'll have an update by the end of today.

name: MadMan
text: Futaba techs in Huntsville did a great job and a quick turnaround on my 32MZ.  I was quite pleased...  now someone please sell more of them so I have company at my flying field!

resp.text: Thanks for your detailed review!  We are glad that you were pleased overall.  We are beefing up our support staff so hopefully our response time will improve.

name: Amy Cannon
text: I still haven't received my order since Dec 7 ,I would like to know where it is at !!!

name: Ruth Dick
text: Easy order, shipped in very good time and was exactly what I wanted. Couldn't have been any easier!

resp.text: Ruth, We're glad to hear that!  Thank you so much for your nice review of us!

name: Billy Teaters
text: Fast service received my item in 3 days a high quality item

name: Tim Sparks
text: Good price for sport servo's I put them in my stash for use as needed. I wouldn't suggest using these and expect super power or super precision. I like the keyless option on the plug.  I'm a JR/Spektrum user and this saves me a little work to get them to plug into my "other" receivers.  The airplane in the picture does not use Futaba servo's

name: bzzboy RC
text: Great communication and knowledge with Skylar to address my needs.  The need to fill out a ticket and get a tech rep involved for a ratchet spring seems to be a bit of a waste of the tech's time and a bit over-complicated for the customer, but Skylar was attentive and obliging for a modest part that satisfied my need.

resp.text: Thanks for the review and the constructive criticism.  Glad that Skylar was helpful to you!

name: Alan Falnes
text: My order was executed promptly and accurately.  The tracking showed it was in process when infact it was on the way.  Dispite tracking, I would purchase from them again.  They had product I was unable to find elsewhere.

resp.text: Alan, thanks for the good review and for your business!

name: Ron Bryner
text: Fast and reliable.  My go to folks for all my radio needs.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback, Ron!

name: Christopher Pytelewski
text: The parts and shipping are great (especially since I live just a state over). They had radio receiver crystals used to restore a friend's old rc car. My only complaint would be compatibility of the site with my Google Pixel phone. The COVID banner blocks site options (I suspect, otherwise the site has no method of searching for products). I'll try again on my laptop as switching to desktop compatibility mode didn't work. Besides that, good company, fast service, broad range of high quality parts!

resp.text: Christopher, thanks for your 5-star review despite out website being problematic on your mobile device.  Thanks for your constructive criticism.  We will look into making our site more mobile-friendly.  Thank you so much for your business!

name: Ed Weber
text: Ordering was easy.  Prompt service...

resp.text: Thanks for the rating!

name: Jerry Kozel
text:
easy website to navigate, order came quickly
will buy again from trusted source

resp.text: Jerry, we're glad you had a smooth purchasing experience on our site.  Thank you for your business and for the great review of us!

name: Kandace Rawling
text:
Super fast shipping! Excellent service.
Highly recommend

resp.text: Kandace, thanks for your 5-star review!  We are glad you are pleased with our shipping and service.  Thank you for your business!!

name: My hobby channel
text: Excellent staff and products. Best servos in the business I think!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and for your 5-star review!  We really appreciate it!  We look forward to serving you again.

name: Mike Feitinger
text: Ordered an aircraft that was shipped promptly and actually arrived early!

name: Matthew Bourgeois
text: Highly recommend Futaba USA! Very high quality RC equipment. Experienced nonexistent customer support from Horizon/Spektrum and have now switched everything over to Futaba!

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks for the awesome review!  We're glad to have you on board with us!  We'll strive to make you happy with quick delivery and product support.  Feel free to contact us at any time!

name: Michael Ball
text: Excellent Service and Quick Shipping!  Thanks Futaba!

name: Mean Joe
text: Awesome job as usual! Love the products! Super proud to be a member of the team!

resp.text: Hey Joe, thanks for the excellent review.  We're glad you love our products and are happy to have you as a member of our team! :)

name: Scott Gerber
text: Received my order quickly and correctly. Kudos to Nick and his crew!

resp.text: Scott, thanks for your 5-star review.  We are pleased that you have been pleased with our quick service and shipping!

name: Charles Pigott
text: Worked great! Solved all my issues.

name: Andres Jaramillo Villegas
text: Great service....fast shipment!!

name: Phillip Factor
text: great job with this gear set. But I needed gears for a different servo. I tried contacting Futaba to ask if they were available and got no reply.

resp.text: Hey, Phillip, as soon as we got in this morning several of us investigated this issue.  I believe you have been contacted by one of our Techs regarding this.  Thanks for your business!

name: Ryan Strankowski
text: I was finally ready to purchase a Futaba 7PX.  I compared prices at several hobby shops online.  Futaba USA had the transmitter on sale.  Setting up the purchase, finding accessories, and checking out was easy.  I also received my package earlier than expected.  A great experience overall.

resp.text: Ryan, thanks for your review.  We are glad we pleased you with our price and service.  We look forward to serving you again in the future!

name: David Hanby
text: I've been using Futaba products since 95 (7 years old) when I got my first rc car kit.  I can say they have come a long way.  Nice web site fast shipping great products.  Love my 7pxr, mc970-cr, gyd550 and the many servos.  This brand brings back all the times spent at the track with my Dad and have brought me back to it years later.  I look forward to seeing what comes next and going back to the track with my Dad.

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks for that touching review, David!  That's awesome that Futaba has been a part of the memories you share with your Dad!  We look forward to more years of serving you!

name: RCFLYERDAN
text:
No issues with US Distribution. Ordered on line, showed up at the door a few days later. It feels great to be back in the comfort of Japanese thinking. I haven’t had a FUT radio system since 2004. Just recently over the past 3-4 years, went through both the Pizza Box radio for most of that time, and G until their bankruptcy. Broke transmitter with no access for parts. The other Japanese radio didn’t have enough transmitting channels, and I got 4 more with the 18, and using all of them.
I haven’t done the re-maiden of my 3 jets yet, but don’t expect any issues. Thanks! Dan

resp.text: Welcome back!  We're glad you're back!  Thanks for your excellent detailed review! :)

name: Keith Green Sr.
text: A pleasure to order from, easy to navigate along with fast shipping.  Shoutout to Skyler in Product Support, always willing to assist with any questions or programming issues.  Futaba USA rocks

resp.text: Thanks for your review, Keith!  We'll get word to Skylar about his excellent service!  We appreciate your business and look forward to helping you again.

name: Chris Kimball
text: Fair price and incredibly fast shipping on a great product

name: Andres Soto
text: Super fast good quality 100%

name: Russell Chambers
text: My product has not arrived yet

name: Daniel Grandmaison
text: Perfect as always! Dan

name: Michael Dorna
text: Excellent customer service experience. Called ahead they explained the process to me in detail and informed me I needed to submit a service request on line, which involved setting up an account.  Took minutes to do that. Very fast turn around on my transmitter check up. Tech I dealt with made me feel like I was the only customer he had.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback Michael!

name: Kim Symmonds
text: Very good service. I couldn't find an option for the transmitter I wanted in mode 1 but Skylar was very helpful and took care of changing my transmitter from mode 2 to mode 1.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Kim!  Thank you for your business.  We'll get word to Skylar for his excellent service.

name: al young
text:
Dealer JTEC/RADIOWAVE: we always get greart service from Futaba. That is why we recommend them.

As a designer and manufacturer of large scale IMAC and scale planes we always trust futaba in our prototype planes and personal planes

resp.text: Thanks, Al!  We're glad you're pleased with our service and products!  Thanks for your business and excellent review!

name: Alex Dreiling
text: Thank you! Faster than expected! Great Job!

resp.text: Alex, thank you for your business and for the 5-star review!!

name: Steve Fujita
text: The best products for R/C hands down. Shipping was fast and straight forward. Top marks in all areas!

resp.text: Awesome!  We are glad you were pleased with us, Steve!  Thanks for your business and excellent review!

name: Ignacio González González
text: Timely shipping and GREAT support. I always get replies within hours of my emails. Fantastic equipment for the RC Enthusiast

resp.text: Ignacio, thanks for you business!  We're glad you're pleased with us!  Thank you for your review!

name: Kevin Moffett
text:
I’m very Happy to have become a Futaba Product user for almost a year now, repair service is was very fast when I had to use it and when I do order Futaba Products the shipping is always well packaged and shipping in a timely matter.

Thank you Futaba for your Professionalism and excellent products that you produce!

Sincerely, a well pleased customer.
Kevin

resp.text: Kevin,  thank you so much for taking the time to write a great review for us!  Welcome to the Futaba family!  We are please to have you on board! :)

name: Steve Rothschild
text: Great price and received quickly. I feel like Futaba really appreciates my business. I am glad that we can buy direct.

resp.text: Steve, sorry for the delayed response.  Yes, we REALLY appreciate your business!  Thank you for being a customer and leaving us a great review!  We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Alex Aulov
text: Would be awesome if there where any FUTABA stickers!!!But they did great!

resp.text: Alex, :)  Thanks for the 5-star review!  The sticker is a good idea!  We'll look into that!

name: KEVIN FEIL
text: Having purchased plenty of equipment this year 2021, to include the New Released Futaba 16iz Transmitter as well as been fortunate to have the opportunity to convert in upwards of double digits those New/Returning to the Futaba product line, None of which mind you would happen without the high level of Customer Service/Care and Tech Support Team to include other Dealers and a army of Team Futaba members and last but not least the Lightning fast Shipping Dept. Thank you again Futaba and proud to be part of a Great Team..

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback, Kevin!

name: Steve Fujita
text: I order from Futaba USA often and they always exceed my expectations. Shipping and customer service is always top notch. Their electronics are second to none in the industry, so there is really no other choice.

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks for the awesome review, Steve!  Thank you so much for being a loyal customer!  We appreciate you! :)

name: Brad Swisher
text: Just bought this R2006GS receiver for a plane that I'm working on. I switched to Futaba a long time ago when I switched from 27 mhz to 2.4 GHz. I've never looked back or had any regrets.

name: Jeff Biter
text: Great transmitter. Item arrived in a double box which effectively protected the contents. Quick shipping

resp.text: Thanks for your review, Jeff!  Glad you were pleased!

name: Francisco Villar
text: All went great and on time

name: Amber Hatch
text: Our order was perfect and delivered quickly as usual.

resp.text: Amber, we're glad you were pleased with the order and the quick delivery!  Thanks for the 5-star review!

name: Jet King
text: I like it! There's many new software features I didn't have in the 14. Also the touch color screen is cool, I like it better then the rotate dial system. Awesome rc transmitter and receiver.

resp.text: Thanks for the nice review!  We are glad you are pleased with the new features!

name: Matt Mathias
text: I dealt with Eric Medley by email he was great very helpful and got me the part I needed. excellent service.

resp.text: Matt, thanks for your 5-star review!  We really appreciate your business.  We'll get word to Eric about his good job!

name: Robert Kinnaman
text: You did not do very good. I tried to order the same items and you would not run the card. I called and you would not take the order tried to tell me that over the phone was dangerous, I have never heard of anyone getting hacked over the phone (landline). You finally took the order the third time. Made me wish I could return all of my Futaba equipment, to you. You need to get a real customer service dept.

resp.text: Hi Robert, I'm not sure why the site wouldn't run your card. Sometimes it's easy to miss a little check box or fill in all the blanks which would cause the card not to run. And yes, we do not take orders over the phone because we prefer you to use trusted PayPal software to keep your information safe. Anyone can jot your card number down over the phone and steal it. However if you need help navigating through the website over the phone, we are happy to help with that.

name: Jimmy T
text:
UPDATE: Since my original review, Futaba reached out to me and demonstrated the customer service that I had initially hoped for. I ended up receiving the product I initially wanted. After using their product for a small amount of time, I will say again that it is solid and backed by a great customer service team. Will purchase again.

Purchased a surface transmitter/receiver and received the wrong receiver. Called them and admitted it could've been my mistake, but was then told to then email them describing the issue. No big deal. Sent the email and did not receive a response. I called back a week later to just find out what my options were and was told to ship both units back at my expense if I wasn't happy with the purchase. Seems strange to ask a pretty simple question and receive an over the top and almost hostile response. I don't know how I conveyed any displeasure with their service/product before receiving that response (I hadn't used the product yet), but Bradley was under that impression. I didn't feel one way another about it initially, but after just a few attempts to correspond with this company I have to say that they have lit the candle. I don't review a lot of company's customer service, but this experience was unnecessarily negative in my opinion. Could've went a lot of directions, but I guess my $220 doesn't grant me access to the "unparalleled customer service" these other reviews mention. After now using the transmitter I think the product is solid and can only hope for issue free operation, but if it's backed by individuals that just brush off initial ordering complications... doesn't sit too well with me. The reps I personally dealt with were Bradley and Bobby. Tread carefully.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Jimmy. We do our best to provide high-caliber customer service that is on par with the quality of our products. Our Customer Service group will be sending you an email this afternoon detailing how we will be making this situation right for you.  Thank you again for your understanding and patience with us!

The sticks are not working correctly. The Throttle stick does not go all the way down, and elevator stick is not centered, even after calibration. The Push Dial is flimsy and sharp. The Transmitter battery Warning is 6.0 which is too high for NiMh. 6.0 is nominal voltage for this battery. Poorly written manual.

What is better than Spectrum is that you need only one receiver, and you have External Voltage port on receiver, and telemetry sensors connect directly to receiver.

resp.text: Maciek, we are very sorry for the concerns that you have. Can you please contact smcdaniel@futaba.com and we will work through the calibration and battery voltage warning with you. These are all adjustable features and can be tailored to be set-up exactly how you would like.

text: Ordered a small part from this company a few weeks ago. After realizing it was the wrong part I sent a few emails trying to iniatw a return.  Totally ghosted me. Thankfully it wasn't very expensive

name: Randy Driscoll
text:
First of all, I am from Canada.  I called today to order a part.  He asked me to describe the symptoms that my Samsung Plasma was experiencing.  Rather than just sell me the part as so many sites have done (I've replaced almost every board in the tv so far)He ran me through a common fix (soldering issue) and asked me to call him back to let him know how I made out.  The fix worked and cost me nothing.  I have been talking to a local repair shop and I never got this kind of service.

Good for Huntsville to have his shop and customer service!

On another note, through just everyday conversation (I am Canadian), I learned that his son is a Doctor in that area.    I'm sure his "customer service" has been handed down!!!

Thanks So Much!!!!!

Randy D
Quispamsis, NB, Canada

name: jakeisme21
text: Had a great experience with this company. Needed to replace the main board in my Seiki 32" TV, they had the part cheaper than anywhere else online. Shipping was quick, the part was nicely packaged, arrived in working order. What more could you ask for? 5 stars.

name: Steven Ilchishin
text: I had a wonderful experience with my online purchase. I was looking for a TV base stand for my LG TV. TVTech Parts was the only place which had it at a decent price (and sold the bracket and screws along with the base). When making the purchase, I forgot to click the "confirm" button. Their team reached out to me via email and asked if I needed any assistance completing the order. This small gesture went a long way. Items were just as described. Shipped fast. Packaged well. A+.

name: Matt Reed
text:
These guys/gals were very helpful. I emailed with one of their reps before making my purchase to make sure the repair was within the scope of my abilities, he assured me that no special tools were needed for my application.  The new screen for my TV arrived promptly and well packaged, install was not bad at all.

Great customer service, I saved a bunch of money compared to buying new, and kept more waste out of landfill.

name: Casey Jones
text: Hi never give reviews cause iam super picky but you guys are excellent from placing the order to recieving it was amazing i,ve been in service for 40 years and in those years there has only been 1 or 2 companies that stood out enough for me to take the time to give a review your one of them i will spread the word to every person i talk with so from the people who ship all the way to the owner your doing things the right way and it was a pleasure to be able to work with you as far as getting me the right parts and a short time keep up the good work and thanks again

name: Jim Rase
text: Originally ordered part was quick, however the part they sent was the wrong one picked from their warehouse. Called them a day later (which has been a week now) and they've promised to send me a replacement part-- which hasn't happened yet. Called again today and found out it was never sent, we'll see if that changes this week.. disappointed so far.

name: Otis Collins
text: My TV when black and wouldn’t show a picture I was determinate that I could, fix my TV myself. I first did some research and discover the problem, after establish what I thought was wrong with television I order the part from Tvtechparts. The parts came about two days later maybe three. I call Tvtechparts and had a great and pleasure conversation with Mr. G who works at Tvtechparts, neither to say my TV was up and running within 20 minutes at tops. I thank you Mr. G and the staff for getting the part to me so fast. A GREAT Company to do business with..
